entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain in the evening then to rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
